reviewText: This is a great series, the humor is incredible
A genuinely hilarious show that must be seen

Don't let the name fool you. Just because it has "Yuri" in it, doesn't make it a Yuri anime. Yes, it has Yuri moments, but when looked as a whole, I consider Yuru Yuri to be more Slice of Life/ Comedy. Really funny! A good time to be had by all. The characters all have their unique quirks and over and above all else, you can't go wrong with watching this show. I originally watched it on Crunchy Roll and I knew I had to buy it. Hilarious situations, funny as well as touching moments, and Chitose.....(You'll know what I mean if you already watched this :D). I give this anime a easy 4.4 out of 5 stars. AKARIN!
I'd definitely would recommend this to anyone
This series is fantastic and one of the best of the genre. The box is very sturdy and good looking including many extras for big fans. A good addition to any anime collection.
Looks amazing, shipping was fairly fast and I loved the art book. The hard cover (idk what you call them, the box you get in a box set) looks good as well xD
If you want some fluffy and completely silly, this is your thing. Bought it when I was down in the dumps and this ridiculous show cheered me up quite a bit.
